text.tspan: Child mortality: UN IGME vs UN DESA comparison, World
Child mortality is the share of newborns who die before reaching the age of five. Sources of child mortality â€“ the UN
Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (IGME) and UN DESA.
Data source: UN Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation; UN (2022)
